CREATE.LABEL: Create
CREATE.IAM_ROLES.TOOLTIP: Select IAM Roles to be used here
CREATE.WORKSPACE_ROLES.TOOLTIP: Create missing Workspace Roles to be used here

MESSAGE.APPLICATION_NOK: An error has occurred. The App was not created.
MESSAGE.PERMISSION_NOK: An error has occurred. The Permission was not created.
MESSAGE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not created.
MESSAGE.WORKSPACE_ROLES_OK: The workspace roles were created successfully
MESSAGE.WORKSPACE_ROLES_NOK: An error has occurred. The workspace roles could not be created.

MESSAGE.OPERATOR_TEXT: This Permission was created automatically. If the application continues to offer this Permission, it will be restored during the next deployment.
MESSAGE.APPLICATION_NOK: An error has occurred. The App was not deleted.
MESSAGE.PERMISSION_NOK: An error has occurred. The Permission was not deleted.
MESSAGE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not deleted.

EDIT.LABEL: Edit
EDIT.DIRECT.TOOLTIP: Edit the Permissions - Every change is saved immediately

MESSAGE.PERMISSION_NOK: An error has occurred. The Permission was not changed.
MESSAGE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not changed.

MESSAGE.ASSIGNMENT.EXPORT_NOK: An error has occurred. Permissions were not exported.

MESSAGE.ASSIGNMENT.IMPORT_NOK: An error has occurred. Permissions were not imported.

SEARCH.SUBHEADER: Management of App and Workspace Permissions

DETAIL.SUBHEADER_WORKSPACE: Managing Business Roles and Permissions of Workspace and all Apps of the registered Applications
DETAIL.SUBHEADER_PRODUCT: Managing Business Roles and Permissions of the Application including all of its Apps
DETAIL.SUBHEADER_APP: Managing Business Roles and Permissions of the App

FILTER.APPS.TOOLTIP: List of Apps following the selection of Applications
FILTER.APP_TYPE.TOOLTIP: App type: MFE = Microfrontend, MS = Microservice
FILTER.PRODUCT.TOOLTIP: The Applications registered in the workspace

APP.NAME: Name
APP.DELETE: Delete App including all Permissions and Roles

SEARCH.NAME: Name
SEARCH.NAME.TOOLTIP: The corresponding name to match the App type (ignored by ALL)

PERMISSION.LABEL: Permissions
PERMISSION.MANDATORY.COLUMN.TOOLTIP: This Permission is absolutely necessary for operation and therefore cannot be edited or deleted.
PERMISSION.MANDATORY.TOOLTIP: If set then this Permission is necessary for operation and cannot therefore be changed or deleted.
PERMISSION.OPERATOR.TOOLTIP: If set then this Permission was automated created. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

ASSIGNMENTS.GRANT_ALL_FOR_ROLE: Grant all Permissions according to the filters (Application, App).
ASSIGNMENTS.REVOKE_ALL_FOR_ROLE: Revoke all Permissions according to the filters (Application, App).

SORT.PRODUCT: Sorting by Application und App IDs

ROLE.LABEL: Roles
ROLE.TOOLTIP: List of Roles to which Permissions can be granted. Permissions for a user only become effective when the Role is assigned to the user.
ROLE.NAME: Name
ROLE.MANDATORY: This Role is necessary for operation and cannot therefore be changed or deleted.

ERRORS.PERMISSION.CREATE_ALREADY_EXISTS: Couldn't create Permission because it already exists
ERRORS.PERMISSION.EDIT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Couldn't change Permission because it already exists

ERRORS.ROLE.EDIT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Couldn't change Permission because it already exists
